name: shared-plan-api-proto
description: A proto API to store customer vulnerabilities and a shared plan

scripts.deploy-ui: cd ui && npm run build && cd .. && sls client deploy --no-confirm --aws-profile hnserverless --stage production
scripts.postinstall: (cd api && echo 'Installing API node modules' && npm i); (cd ui && echo 'Installing UI node modules' && npm i);

author: Ben Pirt
